bug.author: padrian2s
bug.description:
ksonnet version: 0.13.1 jsonnet version: v0.11.2 kubectl version: v1.15.0 client-go version: kubernetes-1.10.4 I'm using a mac distro but also tried on a ubuntu distro (docker pull ubuntu). I tried kfctl init on master but also with different 0.5.x versions. I deployed many times the KF but error is somehow new... When I try to deploy ks components on 0.5.0 or 0.5.1 I get this error: kfctl apply all -V INFO[0000] deploying kubeflow application filename="cmd/apply.go:35" INFO[0000] reading from /root/dspl/app.yaml filename="coordinator/coordinator.go:341" INFO[0000] reading from /root/dspl/app.yaml filename="coordinator/coordinator.go:341" INFO[0000] namespace: kubeflow filename="ksonnet/ksonnet.go:109" ERRO[0005] (Will retry) Component ambassador apply failed; Error: find objects: /root/dspl/ks_app/lib/ksonnet-lib/v1.15.0/k8s.libsonnet:17681:93-94 Unknown variable: x <denchmark-code> "withX-Kubernetes-Embedded-Resource":: self + { "x-kubernetes-embedded-resource": x-kubernetes-embedded-resource }, </denchmark-code>
filename="ksonnet/ksonnet.go:174" ERRO[0011] (Will retry) Component argo apply failed; Error: find objects: /root/dspl/ks_app/lib/ksonnet-lib/v1.15.0/k8s.libsonnet:17681:93-94 Unknown variable: x <denchmark-code> "withX-Kubernetes-Embedded-Resource":: self + { "x-kubernetes-embedded-resource": x-kubernetes-embedded-resource }, </denchmark-code>
filename="ksonnet/ksonnet.go:174" ERRO[0015] (Will retry) Component centraldashboard apply failed; Error: find objects: /root/dspl/ks_app/lib/ksonnet-lib/v1.15.0/k8s.libsonnet:17681:93-94 Unknown variable: x

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.67. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
I get the same problem after upgrading minikube v1.1.1 to v1.2.0 which runs Kubernetes v1.15.0 by default. Minikube v1.1.1 runs fine with Kubernetes v1.14.3

I have the same problem on the latest Kubernetes (v1.15.0) installed using kind. <denchmark-h:h1>kfctl apply all -V prints the following errors:</denchmark-h>
ksonnet-lib/v1.15.0/k8s.libsonnet:17681:93-94 Unknown variable: x

The problem disappears if I follow the current configuration on Kubeflow homepage, <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/started/getting-started-k8s/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/started/getting-started-k8s/</denchmark-link>
I use kind to manage my local kubernetes cluster. <denchmark-link:https://kind.sigs.k8s.io/>https://kind.sigs.k8s.io/</denchmark-link>
So, all I need to do is to tell kfctl the k8s config path (e.g., ~/.kube/config) generated by kind.
